definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
surname Shao/name of an ancient state that existed in what is now Shaanxi Province
to call together/to summon/to convene/temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)

sentences.english: The Christians is called upon to make his material possessions immaterial.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒蒙召爲的是將他擁有的有形財富變成無形的。

sentences.english: Worshipers are called to hear God and to serve him in obedience every day.
sentences.chinese: 敬拜的人每一天都蒙召聆聽神的話和順服事奉祂。

sentences.english: Is any called in uncircumcision? let him not be circumcised.
sentences.chinese: 有人未受割禮蒙召呢，就不要受割禮。

sentences.english: Yet I myself have not been called to go in to the king these thirty days.
sentences.chinese: 現在我沒有蒙召進去見王已經三十日了。

sentences.english: We are called to be the beacons of truth in the battle for her Triumph.
sentences.chinese: 我們爲她的勝利作戰時，蒙召成爲真理的明燈。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
